content.text:
# Ward (given name)

Ward may refer to:

* Ward Beysen (1941–2005), Belgian politician and Freemason
* Ward R. Bliss (1855-1905), Pennsylvania State Representative

* Wardell Ward Bond (1903–1960), American actor
